newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korea bond yields close lower on strong buying.
newsitem.headline: S.Korea bond yields close lower on strong buying.

text.p: Major bond yields closed lower on Thursday based on active buying sparked by expectations that interest rates would fall, dealers said.

Buying of three-year corporate bonds was also boosted by scanty new issues amid improving liquidity, they said. * 3-yr corporates close at 12.25 pct vs Wednesday's 12.40 * 3-mth CDs end at 12.60 pct vs Wednesday's 12.80 * Average overnight call rate at 11.8 pct vs Wednesday's 11.3 -------------------------------------------------------------
